channel.title: PvP on Pwnscape
channel.description: Hey everyone, thanks for taking the time to read this. Now I own a PwnScape based server, which i'm sure is Delta. Now I'd like to know how I can actually change the server to PvP. I know how to make like people be able to attack people anywhere. But how do you make the safe spots? the drops? and the levels in the bottom right-hand corner of the screen?(example Levels 113-120) and also I was thinking, since i'm releasing a beta version of my server to my friends I wanted to make two clients. One is the PvP one and one is the normal one. But how would I make the PvP one work with the characters? (explanation: when a player moves/gets an item in one of these clients how would I make it update the character's file for both servers? Like they're all linked to one char folder) Thank you very much for reading :P please respond or at least try to help. :cool:

item.title: PvP on Pwnscape
item.dc:creator: @davis_p davis p
item.description:
@davis_p wrote:

Hmm That might be something under client.java or player.java. Also check playerhandler.java… I don’t really work with pvp but I think that might help.

Read full topic

item.title: PvP on Pwnscape
item.dc:creator: @Fox0wnage Fox0wnage
item.description:
@Fox0wnage wrote:

I’m talking about pvp drops? but thanks anyway.

Read full topic

item.title: PvP on Pwnscape
item.dc:creator: @Phineas Phineas
item.description:
@Phineas wrote:

I know to edit drops you go to npcdrops.cfg, I will try to help you out some more.

Read full topic

item.title: PvP on Pwnscape

@Fox0wnage wrote:

Hey everyone, thanks for taking the time to read this. Now I own a PwnScape based server, which i’m sure is Delta. Now I’d like to know how I can actually change the server to PvP. I know how to make like people be able to attack people anywhere. But how do you make the safe spots? the drops? and the levels in the bottom right-hand corner of the screen?(example Levels 113-120)
and also I was thinking, since i’m releasing a beta version of my server to my friends I wanted to make two clients. One is the PvP one and one is the normal one. But how would I make the PvP one work with the characters? (explanation: when a player moves/gets an item in one of these clients how would I make it update the character’s file for both servers? Like they’re all linked to one char folder)
Thank you very much for reading please respond or at least try to help.
